_licenseLong: This document contains data extracted from consolidated legal texts that were downloaded from <https://eur-lex.europa.eu>. The copyright for the consolidated texts, which is owned by the EU, is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International licence​​ (<https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/>). This means that you can re-use the content provided you acknowledge the source and indicate any changes you have made. The data is not necessarily comprehensive, complete, accurate or up to date. The acknowledgement is not needed when using statements of the data set for labelling products, of course, as this is the intended usage.

statements.latest/en/H203: Explosive; fire, blast or projection hazard.
statements.latest/en/H229: Pressurised container: May burst if heated.
statements.latest/en/H230: May react explosively even in the absence of air.
statements.latest/en/H231: May react explosively even in the absence of air at elevated pressure and/or temperature.
statements.latest/en/H241: Heating may cause a fire or explosion.
statements.latest/en/H250: Catches fire spontaneously if exposed to air.
statements.latest/en/H252: Self-heating in large quantities; may catch fire.
statements.latest/en/H260: In contact with water releases flammable gases which may ignite spontaneously.
statements.latest/en/H261: In contact with water releases flammable gases.
statements.latest/en/H270: May cause or intensify fire; oxidiser.
statements.latest/en/H271: May cause fire or explosion; strong oxidiser.
statements.latest/en/H280: Contains gas under pressure; may explode if heated.
statements.latest/en/H281: Contains refrigerated gas; may cause cryogenic burns or injury.
statements.latest/en/H304: May be fatal if swallowed and enters airways.
statements.latest/en/H314: Causes severe skin burns and eye damage.
statements.latest/en/H317: May cause an allergic skin reaction.
statements.latest/en/H334: May cause allergy or asthma symptoms or breathing difficulties if inhaled.
statements.latest/en/H340: May cause genetic defects <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H341: Suspected of causing genetic defects <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H350: May cause cancer <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H351: Suspected of causing cancer <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H360: May damage fertility or the unborn child <state specific effect if known > <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H360FD: May damage fertility. May damage the unborn child.
statements.latest/en/H360Fd: May damage fertility. Suspected of damaging the unborn child.
statements.latest/en/H360Df: May damage the unborn child. Suspected of damaging fertility.
statements.latest/en/H361: Suspected of damaging fertility or the unborn child <state specific effect if known> <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H361d: Suspected of damaging the unborn child.
statements.latest/en/H361fd: Suspected of damaging fertility. Suspected of damaging the unborn child.
statements.latest/en/H362: May cause harm to breast-fed children.
statements.latest/en/H370: Causes damage to organs <or state all organs affected, if known> <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H371: May cause damage to organs <or state all organs affected, if known> <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H372: Causes damage to organs <or state all organs affected, if known> through prolonged or repeated exposure <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H373: May cause damage to organs <or state all organs affected, if known> through prolonged or repeated exposure <state route of exposure if it is conclusively proven that no other routes of exposure cause the hazard>.
statements.latest/en/H300+H310: Fatal if swallowed or in contact with skin
statements.latest/en/H300+H310+H330: Fatal if swallowed, in contact with skin or if inhaled
statements.latest/en/H300+H330: Fatal if swallowed or if inhaled

statements.latest/en/H302+H312+H332: Harmful if swallowed, in contact with skin or if inhaled
statements.latest/en/H302+H332: Harmful if swallowed or if inhaled
statements.latest/en/H310+H330: Fatal in contact with skin or if inhaled
statements.latest/en/H311+H331: Toxic in contact with skin or if inhaled
statements.latest/en/H312+H332: Harmful in contact with skin or if inhaled
statements.latest/en/H410: Very toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.
statements.latest/en/H411: Toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.
statements.latest/en/H412: Harmful to aquatic life with long lasting effects.
statements.latest/en/H413: May cause long lasting harmful effects to aquatic life.
statements.latest/en/H420: Harms public health and the environment by destroying ozone in the upper atmosphere
statements.latest/en/EUH018: In use may form flammable/explosive vapour-air mixture.
statements.latest/en/EUH029: Contact with water liberates toxic gas.
statements.latest/en/EUH031: Contact with acids liberates toxic gas.
statements.latest/en/EUH032: Contact with acids liberates very toxic gas.
statements.latest/en/EUH044: Risk of explosion if heated under confinement.
statements.latest/en/EUH066: Repeated exposure may cause skin dryness or cracking.
statements.latest/en/EUH201: Contains lead. Should not be used on surfaces liable to be chewed or sucked by children.
statements.latest/en/EUH202: Cyanoacrylate. Danger. Bonds skin and eyes in seconds. Keep out of the reach of children.
statements.latest/en/EUH203: Contains chromium (VI). May produce an allergic reaction.
statements.latest/en/EUH204: Contains isocyanates. May produce an allergic reaction.
statements.latest/en/EUH205: Contains epoxy constituents. May produce an allergic reaction.
statements.latest/en/EUH206: Warning! Do not use together with other products. May release dangerous gases (chlorine).
statements.latest/en/EUH207: Warning! Contains cadmium. Dangerous fumes are formed during use. See information supplied by the manufacturer. Comply with the safety instructions.
statements.latest/en/EUH208: Contains <name of sensitising substance>. May produce an allergic reaction.
statements.latest/en/EUH209: Can become highly flammable in use.
statements.latest/en/EUH210: Safety data sheet available on request.
statements.latest/en/EUH401: To avoid risks to human health and the environment, comply with the instructions for use.
statements.latest/en/P101: If medical advice is needed, have product container or label at hand.
statements.latest/en/P102: Keep out of reach of children.
statements.latest/en/P202: Do not handle until all safety precautions have been read and understood.
statements.latest/en/P210: Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking.
statements.latest/en/P211: Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source.
statements.latest/en/P220: Keep away from clothing and other combustible materials.
statements.latest/en/P222: Do not allow contact with air.
statements.latest/en/P223: Do not allow contact with water.
statements.latest/en/P231: Handle and store contents under inert gas/…
statements.latest/en/P240: Ground and bond container and receiving equipment.
statements.latest/en/P243: Take action to prevent static discharges.
statements.latest/en/P244: Keep valves and fittings free from oil and grease.
statements.latest/en/P251: Do not pierce or burn, even after use.
statements.latest/en/P262: Do not get in eyes, on skin, or on clothing.
statements.latest/en/P263: Avoid contact during pregnancy and while nursing.
statements.latest/en/P270: Do not eat, drink or smoke when using this product.
statements.latest/en/P271: Use only outdoors or in a well-ventilated area.
statements.latest/en/P272: Contaminated work clothing should not be allowed out of the workplace.
statements.latest/en/P280: Wear protective gloves/protective clothing/eye protection/face protection.
statements.latest/en/P282: Wear cold insulating gloves and either face shield or eye protection.
statements.latest/en/P283: Wear fire resistant or flame retardant clothing.
statements.latest/en/P284: [In case of inadequate ventilation] wear respiratory protection.
statements.latest/en/P231+P232: Handle and store contents under inert gas/…. Protect from moisture.
statements.latest/en/P312: Call a POISON CENTRE/doctor/… if you feel unwell.
statements.latest/en/P314: Get medical advice/attention if you feel unwell.
statements.latest/en/P320: Specific treatment is urgent (see … on this label).
statements.latest/en/P333: If skin irritation or rash occurs:
statements.latest/en/P334: Immerse in cool water [or wrap in wet bandages].
statements.latest/en/P335: Brush off loose particles from skin.
statements.latest/en/P336: Thaw frosted parts with lukewarm water. Do no rub affected area.
statements.latest/en/P338: Remove contact lenses, if present and easy to do. Continue rinsing.
statements.latest/en/P340: Remove person to fresh air and keep comfortable for breathing.
statements.latest/en/P351: Rinse cautiously with water for several minutes.
statements.latest/en/P360: Rinse immediately contaminated clothing and skin with plenty of water before removing clothes.
statements.latest/en/P361: Take off immediately all contaminated clothing.
statements.latest/en/P371: In case of major fire and large quantities:
statements.latest/en/P373: DO NOT fight fire when fire reaches explosives.
statements.latest/en/P375: Fight fire remotely due to the risk of explosion.
statements.latest/en/P376: Stop leak if safe to do so.
statements.latest/en/P377: Leaking gas fire: Do not extinguish, unless leak can be stopped safely.
statements.latest/en/P381: In case of leakage, eliminate all ignition sources.
statements.latest/en/P390: Absorb spillage to prevent material damage.
statements.latest/en/P301+P310: IF SWALLOWED: Immediately call a POISON CENTER/doctor/…
statements.latest/en/P301+P312: IF SWALLOWED: Call a POISON CENTRE/doctor/… if you feel unwell.
statements.latest/en/P301+P330+P331: IF SWALLOWED: Rinse mouth. Do NOT induce vomiting.
statements.latest/en/P302+P334: IF ON SKIN: Immerse in cool water or wrap in wet bandages.
statements.latest/en/P302+P335+P334: IF ON SKIN: Brush off loose particles from skin. Immerse in cool water [or wrap in wet bandages].
statements.latest/en/P302+P352: IF ON SKIN: Wash with plenty of water/…
statements.latest/en/P303+P361+P353: IF ON SKIN (or hair): Take off immediately all contaminated clothing. Rinse skin with water [or shower].
statements.latest/en/P304+P340: IF INHALED: Remove person to fresh air and keep comfortable for breathing.
statements.latest/en/P305+P351+P338: IF IN EYES: Rinse cautiously with water for several minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present and easy to do. Continue rinsing.
statements.latest/en/P306+P360: IF ON CLOTHING: rinse immediately contaminated clothing and skin with plenty of water before removing clothes.
statements.latest/en/P308+P311: IF exposed or concerned: Call a POISON CENTER/doctor/…
statements.latest/en/P308+P313: IF exposed or concerned: Get medical advice/attention.
statements.latest/en/P332+P313: If skin irritation occurs: Get medical advice/attention.
statements.latest/en/P333+P313: If skin irritation or rash occurs: Get medical advice/attention.
statements.latest/en/P336+P315: Thaw frosted parts with lukewarm water. Do not rub affected area. Get immediate medical advice/attention.
statements.latest/en/P337+P313: If eye irritation persists: Get medical advice/attention.
statements.latest/en/P342+P311: If experiencing respiratory symptoms: Call a POISON CENTER/doctor/…
statements.latest/en/P361+P364: Take off immediately all contaminated clothing and wash it before reuse.
statements.latest/en/P362+P364: Take off contaminated clothing and wash it before reuse.
statements.latest/en/P370+P372+P380+P373: In case of fire: Explosion risk. Evacuate area. DO NOT fight fire when fire reaches explosives.
statements.latest/en/P370+P376: In case of fire: Stop leak if safe to do so.
statements.latest/en/P370+P378: In case of fire: Use… to extinguish.
statements.latest/en/P370+P380+P375: In case of fire: Evacuate area. Fight fire remotely due to the risk of explosion.
statements.latest/en/P370+P380+P375[+P378]: In case of fire: Evacuate area. Fight fire remotely due to the risk of explosion. [Use … to extinguish].
statements.latest/en/P371+P380+P375: In case of major fire and large quantities: Evacuate area. Fight fire remotely due to the risk of explosion.
statements.latest/en/P406: Store in a corrosion-resistant/… container with a resistant inner liner.
statements.latest/en/P407: Maintain air gap between stacks or pallets.
statements.latest/en/P412: Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50 °C/122°F.
statements.latest/en/P413: Store bulk masses greater than … kg/… lbs at temperatures not exceeding … °C/…°F.
statements.latest/en/P402+P404: Store in a dry place. Store in a closed container.
statements.latest/en/P403+P233: Store in a well-ventilated place. Keep container tightly closed.
statements.latest/en/P403+P235: Store in a well-ventilated place. Keep cool.
statements.latest/en/P410+P403: Protect from sunlight. Store in a well-ventilated place.
statements.latest/en/P410+P412: Protect from sunlight. Do no expose to temperatures exceeding 50 °C/122°F.
statements.latest/en/P502: Refer to manufacturer or supplier for information on recovery or recycling.
